website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the price, this is a unique novelty item that will add fun to your Halloween celebrations.
pros: Decorative foam coffin lights up, howls, and shakes
Features a wooden look with chains
Makes a fun prop for Halloween parties, yards, and haunted houses
cons: Falls on the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: looks an work good
customer_reviews.text: saved online ad picture to assemble / yes it is flimsy an will have to beef it up next year with 1/4 inch plywood but most likely cardboard from a dryer or refrigerator box from a local store [not that big of deal]. make notes so when cardboard goes bad cut it out faster the next time. Don't plan on letting it run constantly so it should last awhile. SO OVER ALL it is a good product that could be made great but would cost more. Here is a thought Styrofoam board from hardware store. Or from a furniture store for free maybe.
customer_reviews.author: mark t

customer_reviews.title: Is It Is What It Is?
customer_reviews.text: I really have to read descriptions more carefully. I saw this really cool casket that supposedly moves and makes sounds, etc. I just received it and was surprised to see this small box. First, it requires assembly. Second it is some type of rubbery material (not styrofoam). I see the speaker box inside so, hopefully it is worth the $$$ I paid once it is assembled and set up. The picture shown does not look anything like kit does in the small box that I received.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rebillot

customer_reviews.title: So fun! Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit of a bear to assemble and I did accidentally rip a couple holes making the zip ties too tight, but when assembled it looks great! Just be aware once assembled, you cannot disassemble for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah U

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: After being on lawn for 2 days collapsed not worth the money I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I will be able to get a couple of seasons because of the quality of product. The foam sides are already cracking and I haven't used it yet. I would not but again.
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is way over priced and is very poorly made!! This thing doesn’t even deserve a star!! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!! I REPEAT DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffin
customer_reviews.text: Have been used outside for 2 Halloween now and holding up nicely
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Good with some interference.
customer_reviews.text: Great for its purpose. The ball rattled too strongly. Place a soft object under the ball and you are set.
customer_reviews.author: HABITUAL-line-STEPPER

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE TIME OR MONEY.....VERY POOR DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: Not worth $100 at all. Didn’t even have a back. Sound activated I thought. But you have to pound on it for it to activate. Returning this and getting a refund. No star rating. I selected 1 star in order to submit this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This product is not practical at all.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike it because it does not hold the shape at all. The provided supports do not work and the product collapses to the ground losing its expected effect and function.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: To expensive for what I got
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but the material is foam. Can't put it outside on the porch. Without it would be real looking for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much what I expected when ordering. It was easy to put together, there is a really strong chemical smell though. It’s also very light weight so when you put it outside be sure to weigh it down.
customer_reviews.author: Reecy KingTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A g seller
customer_reviews.text: This not 6 foot i know that I deed not ioen IT but small bag it go up soon I let u know mire soon thank u do chepa looking not with the money ugh
customer_reviews.author: B v

customer_reviews.title: Zip ties out the wazoo & no directions....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble & disassemble, just takes a lot of time. But completely worth it! Awesome!!! You even her tapping from the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Collapsed Almost Immediately
customer_reviews.text: This coffin collapsed almost immediately. It needs a TOP and BOTTOM frame and it only contains one. When it began to collapse, the ties pulled through the foam as well. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Thoke

product_meta.title: Halloween Haunters Life Size 64" Animated Shaking Coffin with Speaking Corpse and Chains Prop Decoration - 3 Desperate Howling Spooky Phrases - Haunted House Casket, Grave Corpse, Death, Skeleton
feature_bullets: This coffin victim refuses to give up the ghost! While this coffin shakes, you hear 3 desperate howling phrases with chains clanking as someone's desperate to avoid a premature burial!
Animated movement that's sound and touch activated: Shaking and rattling foam coffin - 3 Desperate howling phrases with chains clanking - Light up red LED's
Place this 64" (5' 4") life size haunted and rattling coffin on the ground, leaning against wall, on a table or leave half of it open with the scary skeleton corpse sticking out of it!
Speaks three desperate howling phrases with chains clanking in the background - "Oooh, oooh, oooh help me!", "Please let me out! Aaahh!", "Release me! I want out, I want out!"
Dimensions: 64" long by 22" wide and 11 inches deep. Powered with 3 - AA Batteries (included). Some assembly required.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
